name: Gripshot
description:
Group project for the University of Northampton game jam: YamFest 2023. Made in 4 days. 

Climb the cliff using the grapple shot, switch to the shotgun mode to take out any foes in the way!

Gripshot was developed for the sinden lite gun input device, but can still be played using a mouse.

Keyboard and Mouse controls:

Shoot/Grapple - Left click

Switch Gun Mode - Right click

To Swing Higher In Grapple - Right click + drag mouse down + release 

The Team:

Jay paris - Programming, Environment Art, UI

Jordan Tomkins - Level Design, Mechanic Design, UI

Nick Scarlat - Prop Art, Concepts, UI

Brandon Lewis - Prop Art, UI

Ty Sealey - Prop Art, Environment Art
